services.text2: The specific tools used for back-end development depend on the requirements of a project, the programming language being used, and the developer's preferences and experience. The back-end developer's role is to build and maintain the server-side of the application and ensure that it can effectively handle the required data and communication between the front-end and the database.

terms.heading: Terms of Use: Our Commitment to Your Trust and Security
terms.titleData1: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit, subscribe, register or make a purchase from nftfox, ‘Site’.
terms.titleData2: Personal data refers to any information that can be used to identify a specific individual, such as their name, address, email, phone number, and so on. This can also include sensitive information like financial details, medical records, and biometric data. Personal data is protected by laws and regulations such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in the European Union and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) in the United States, which set guidelines for how organizations can collect, use, and protect personal data.

titleData3.paragraph1: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our products and services, such as by personalizing content, offering and measuring advertisements, understanding user behaviour, and providing a safer experience.
titleData3.paragraph2: You can remove or reject cookies using your browser or device settings, but in some cases doing so may affect your ability to use our products and services.

titleData4.point1: 1. Right to access: Users have the right to request and receive information about the personal data that an auction site has collected about them.
titleData4.point2: 2. Right to rectification: Users have the right to request that any inaccurate or incomplete personal data be corrected.
titleData4.point3: 3. Right to erasure: Users have the right to request that their personal data be deleted.
titleData4.point4: 4. Right to object: Users have the right to object to the processing of their personal data for certain purposes.
titleData4.point5: 5. Right to data portability: Users have the right to request that their personal data be transferred to another organization in a commonly used and machine-readable format.
titleData4.point6: 6. Right to be informed: Users have the right to be informed about how their personal data is being used and for what purpose.
titleData4.point7: 7. Right to complain: Users have the right to file a complaint with the relevant regulatory body if they believe their rights have been violated.
titleData4.point8: 8. Right to know about data breaches: Users have the right to be informed if there is a data breach which involves their personal data.It's important to note that these rights may vary depending on the specific laws and regulations in your jurisdiction.
